name: Ultimate Registry Fix
short_description:
This is a massive registry fix, it will fix the following errors:

Disabled Task Manager
Disabled CMD
Disabled System Restore
Disabled Regedit
Disabled Control Panel
Disabled Shutdown Button
Disabled Uninstall Programs
Disabled Context Menu
Disabled Internet
Disabled Internet Connections
Disabled Start Menu Buttons
Disabled Printer Connections
Disabled Change Password
Disabled Lock Computer
Disabled Tray Menu
Disabled Desktop
Disabled Context Menu
Disabled Background Page
And Many More Disabled Options
It will also fix the following file extensions: exe, mp3, png, txt, dll, vbs, reg, xml.

Tested on WIndows XP, Windows 7, yet to be tested in Windows 8.
